reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super fun and easy!
reviews.reviewText: I loved this book so much I bought their other book as well for how to make Ramen! They are fun and easy to read, great recipes and makes something that seems difficult to make not so scary! I found a great maker for the dowels to help roll out the doughs, now I’m on a roll! 😅

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don't let the comic book presentation fool you. This is an excellent collection of dumpling recipes. I really enjoyed the organization of the materials presented and the gentle step-by-step instructions. Great for seasoned dumpling makers and new cooks alike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It teaches you about dumplings.
reviews.reviewText: Lots of pictures to show you how to fold the dough, and tells a little about each dumpling. It's a good book if your serious about making dumplings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this book is mouthwatering!
reviews.reviewText: Call me biased but because im a dumpling fan, I enjoyed this book very much!! Not Only the illustrations are great but the recipes are easy to follow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great animation. Very fun concept. Great history of dumplings. And successful recipes. I'm having lots of fun using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the book, love the recipes, love the art!
reviews.reviewText: I fell in love with the first publication "Let's Make Ramen" from the same two authors. This book is just as lovely and just as inviting! I made so many of the recipes! I feel that some of the recipes may need adjustment in the ginger/garlic/onion department (especially ginger as it's just listed in inches but as you know, ginger roots come in all sizes). I've been really enjoying each page though, and each time I make a new batch, it gives me confidence in the next one! I'm hoping the next book is "Let's Make Egg Rolls" :)Check this book out, it's really fun and the recipes are really simple!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this book! It teaches you how to cook with fun and informative illustrations. The recipes are so yummy and easy to follow!

Excellent livre de recettes. Toutes les étapes des recettes sont détaillées, du début à la fin, image par image. Ce sont toutes des images dessinées, style « bande dessinée ». Il est donc très simple de suivre toutes les étapes. On retrouve une grande quantité de recettes diverses. Personnellement j’aurais préféré avoir une « vrai image » à la fin de chaque recette, afin de mieux voir l’assiette final, plutôt que d’avoir un « dessin » de l’assiette… mais c’est un choix personnel! Pour le reste, c’est un beau livre, il y a des recettes de toutes sortes, et toutes les étapes sont très simple à suivre. Très satisfaite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great book, good Christmas present bargain price

reviews.reviewTitle: A Fun and Informative Recipe Book
reviews.reviewText: Let's Make Dumplings!: A Comic Book Cookbook is an excellent recipe book that combines the love of cooking with a fun and engaging comic book style. This cookbook is a great resource for anyone who loves dumplings and wants to learn how to make them in a fun and easy way.The book is filled with a variety of dumpling recipes that are described in a simple and easy-to-follow format. Each recipe is accompanied by charming illustrations that make the book a delight to read. In addition to the recipes, there are also helpful tips and tricks that provide guidance on everything from selecting the right ingredients to the correct cooking techniques.One of the things I really appreciate about this book is that it doesn't take itself too seriously. The lighthearted comic book style makes it enjoyable to read and adds an element of fun to the cooking process. This makes it a great book for kids, as well as for adults who are looking to learn how to make dumplings.The recipes themselves are fantastic and cover a wide range of dumpling styles, from classic Chinese pork dumplings to contemporary vegetarian versions. The book also provides information on how to store dumplings and how to reheat them, which is very helpful for those who want to make larger batches.In conclusion, I would highly recommend Let's Make Dumplings!: A Comic Book Cookbook to anyone who loves cooking and wants to learn how to make dumplings in a fun and engaging way. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced cook, this book is sure to provide you with a fun and informative cooking experience.

reviews.reviewTitle: Two arts beautifully combined as one, hats off to art and the artists.
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful work. Maybe one series for vegans!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good book but all the ingredients might not be available.
reviews.reviewText: Reduced a star for the long shipping from Amazon. Was almost on the verge of cancelling it today. Also came in a paper envelope which had got wet on one side and dissolved part of the envelope.However miraculously, the book was bone dry. there was what appeared to be a water stain, but a quick Google search revealed that it was a design element. Got it at a price of 588 which was a steal as other sellers are selling it for more than twice this amount.Got this book after purchasing the Ramen book by the same authors. Good investment. Also good quality pages and lovely comic book style steps.Uses a lot of pork which I prefer to eat only occasionally, besides too much work for a single person, unless you are having guests over. This is true of the ramen book too, unless you have the option of a large refrigerator/freezer to make stock and freeze it.The book has a sticker for Rs 799 and the printed price on the book is USD 19.99 /CAD 25.99
